lines: INTERCHANGE OF XINSHA ROAD AND XIHUAN ROAD

description.text: Shanshui Hotel Shenzhen is a 4 star business hotel locates in the flourishing city of Shenzhen. There are 142 well decorated and modernized designed guest rooms .It is free 24 Hours High Speed wifi in public area, free 24 Hours High Speed wifi in rooms, Chinese and English newspapers and 2 bottles of mineral water. All the guest rooms are equipped with IDD/DDD, satellite TV, makeup mirror and private shower. The hotel has 2 conference rooms from 10 to 100 persons, which are equipped with advanced facilities as multi-media projector system, conference discussion system, conference voting system, etc. Chinese and foreign restaurants provide delicious local and foreign cuisine. Guests will enjoy Massage, Sauna, and Chess, etc. in entertainment center. Its stylish and fashionable character gives you a wonderful feeling and welcome you have a good time here.
Parking

Master Hotel Wenjindu is a 4 star business hotel which is located at the Wenjindu Shore with convenient traffic, close to Hong Kong and Luohu, adjacent to the subway, Huanggang Port and shopping center,. It provides free 24 Hours High Speed WIFI in public, free 24 Hours High Speed wifi in rooms. Its guest rooms and suits are well furnished with Modern facilities and amenities such as satellite TV set, IDD/DDD telephone, mini bar with hard and soft drink, and luxury bathroom. You can find you favorite food, in or around the hotel, which will satisfy your expectation for delicious Chinese food. There are massage and sauna recreational services for your choices in recreation center which will relieve you from all exhaustion and tiredness of trip. All our staff is ready to serve you by professional soft ware and hard ware with our warm hearts.
深圳华侨大厦酒店是一家商务型涉外酒店。地处深圳市罗湖区和平路，紧邻罗湖口岸、罗湖火车站、地铁起始站，交通极为便利。酒店拥有各类宽敞舒适的客房，包含标准单、双人房、豪华单双人房、豪华套房等。房间均设有宽带上网、24小时热水等。酒店还设有茶餐厅、商务中心和保健桑拿等配套服务设施，无论休闲旅游还是商务公干都是理想选择。　　酒店开业时间2008年9月，楼高5层，客房总数80间（套）。

Luo Hu International Hotel is a 4 star business hotel which is located in the central business area in Shenzhen city. It situated near luohu port, some steps to the railway station, subway station. There are 210 guestrooms, free WIFI in public area and some rooms, free internet internet access. Chinese and English newspapers, free two bottles of mineral water are available for the guest free of charge. Modern facilities such as air conditioner, mini bar, writing desk and chairs, closet, DDD, well found bathroom with private shower or bathtub, hair dryer and many other equipment to satisfy the guests. It features 3 conference rooms, the biggest one covers 120 square meters. There are Chinese, western, Japanese restaurant where guest can taste all kinds of delicious food. It also equipped with beauty salon, massage, sauna, chess, KTV, night club where guest can spend the leisure time.
深圳王子客栈王子客栈按四星级标准装修并由著名设计师设计的深圳王子客栈主楼楼高36层，拥有多间美轮美奂、独具匠心、时尚精典的客房，房内提供免费宽带上网、独立淋浴间、卫星（有线）电视、国内国际直拨电话、洗衣服务、擦鞋服务等，另深圳王子客栈提供免费停车场，是您入住及商务的理想首选。

FIND CLASSIC STYLE AND PERSONAL SERVICE IN CHINAS BOOMTOWN AT THE CROWNE PLAZA HOTEL AMP SUITES LANDMARK SHENZHEN.  STEP FROM THE CITY STREETS INTO OUR TIMELESSLY ELEGANT MARBLED LOBBY. YOU CAN TAKE A SEAT WHILE WE CHECK YOU INTO YOUR SPACIOUS ROOM OR STUDIO ROOM AT CROWNE PLAZA HOTEL AMP SUITES LANDMARK SHENZHEN. WHEN YOURE READY UNWIND WITH AFTERNOON TEA BENEATH THE GLASS ROOF OF OUR GRAND ATRIUM OR MEET FRIENDS IN OUR LOBBY LOUNGE FOR CELEBRATORY DRINKS.  CROWNE PLAZA HOTEL AMP SUITES LANDMARK SHENZHEN IS SURROUNDED BY THE SHOPS AND BUSINESSES OF LUOHU. YOURE 40 MINUTES DRIVE FROM SHENZHEN BAOAN INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT AND 30 MINUTES TO CHINESE FOLK CULTURE VILLAGE WINDOW OF THE WORLD AND HAPPY VALLEY THEME PARKS. WERE 5 MINUTES FROM LUOHU RAIL STATION AND THE BORDER INTO HONG KONG. OUR STUDIO ROOMS PROVIDE 24 HOUR BUTLERS WHOLL UNPACK YOUR BAGS WHILE YOU RELAX IN OUR EXCLUSIVE CLUB LOUNGE. YOU CAN DISCOVER ITALIAN FOOD IN PREGO CHINESE DIM SUM IN FORTUNE COURT OR MASSAGES IN YUAN SPA. TRY A CRISP PILSNER FROM OUR BREWERY OR FIND A CONTEMPLATIVE CORNER IN THE WOOD PANELLED WINE AMP CIGAR LOUNGE. SHARPEN YOUR SWING ON OUR DRIVING RANGE BEFORE A ROUND ON MISSION HILLS GOLF COURSE OR ENERGISE IN OUR FITNESS CENTRE AND SWIMMING POOL. ASK YOUR CONCIERGE AT CROWNE PLAZA HOTEL AMP SUITES LANDMARK SHENZHEN TO SHOW YOU A FRESH PERSPECTIVE ON THIS PROGRESSIVE FRONTIER CITY.

Guangsheng International Hotel is a 3 star business hotel locates in business and financial center of Shenzhen. Five minutes to Luohu border crossing and is adjacent to train terminus and MTR station. The hotel has 155 rooms. All equipped with free internet access, IDD, TV, air conditioner, private bathroom, etc. Free wifi in public area. Mu Dan Seafood Restaurant, luxurious Graceful dining envioronment with 6 private rooms. Specialized in the finest Cantonse cuisine, sharks fin, abalone, birds nest and other well prepared seafood dishes, sincerely offer you a variety ofrefined dim-sum cuisine of china. The health Club equipped with Sauna and Steam facilities. Skillful masseuse or masseur relieves your fatigued feet and body by means of Foot Reflexology massage, tradtional Chinense or Thai style body massage. Earwax cleaning, pedicure and mancure, all be arranged round the clock.
酒店设计超越时代潮流，五种独特的设计风格，精雕细琢160间客房，非身临其境不能感受其精美奢华；置身其中，独揽都市美景，佐以不同风格的设计理念，满足不同体验需求。

Hubei Business Hotel is a 3 star Modern business hotel which is located in the center of Shenzhen. It is designed in European style and located in Central Finance District, close to huaqiang north and east gate commercial circle, adjacent to the shennan avenue, just five minutes to railway station, 45 minutes to shenzhen airport, subway station near at hand, etc. the traffic is very convenient. 71 guestrooms are provided including non-smoking rooms. The wired internet, wifi, newspaper are free for the guests and if you choose suite you can also drink 2 bottles of mineral water for free. Guest can enjoy free wifi in public area and central heating in winter, also shuttle service is provided. In your spare time, recreation center which serves beauty salon, massage, sauna and chess room will be a best place for you to choose.

Gorgeous Fad Hotel is a 3 star business hotel located in the flourishing area in Shenzhen. The transportation near the hotel is very excellent, either to the business center or to the passenger transport are very smart. The hotel has 100 comfortable rooms, guest can enjoy free high speed internet access, besides all of the rooms well decorated with modern facilities, such as, central air conditioner, mini bar, IDD, DDD, writing desk and chairs, closet with bathrobe and clothes hangers, bright make up mirror, well found bath room with private shower, shampoo, etc. Free wifi in public area. The minimum conference room in the hotel equipped with all kinds of advanced meeting facilities and with the max carrying capacity of 40 persons. Guest can taste SiChuan style dishes in the Chinese restaurant. And in the recreation center guest can enjoy beauty salon, massage, sauna, etc.

莫泰168（深圳罗芳店）地处深圳市罗湖区罗芳立交旁，北面是秀丽的东湖公园，南靠文锦渡海关，西临东门商业圈，交通十分便利；酒店是第三代全新连锁酒店，拥有各类客房，可同时接待500多人入住；客房均配有宽带上网、IDD、有线电视、及VOD视频点播系统等设施齐备，同时配备一个容纳45人左右的VIP会议室和一个约能容纳220人的大型会议厅。　　二楼上海菜“美林阁”餐厅以苏、浙、沪菜为基础，集全国各大菜系之精华，融合了东、西方饮食文化，价廉物美，餐厅设计突显文化底蕴，为客人带来艺术的享受。酒店配套设施完善，另拥有停车场，是客人商务洽谈、小型聚会、娱乐休闲的首选场所。　　酒店开业时间2006年11月28日，楼高28层，客房总数425间（套）。【温馨提示】如需洗漱用品可在前台领取（免费）。

Nestled within the famed Luohu District Financial Center, whose trademark silhouette dominates the skyline of the city's renowned Special Economic Zone, the landmark St. Regis Shenzhen is ideally positioned atop an exclusive business and shopping podium.Our 24-hour Concierge Desk reveals our commitment to bespoke service while three dining venues and a wine bar offer epicurean excellence. When united with an indoor swimming pool, fitness center, and Iridium Spa, uncompromising living is guaranteed.Our 290 elegantly appointed guest rooms, including 33 suites, present myriad custom amenities, from 3D LCD televisions to signature St. Regis beds. Moreover, every experience is elevated by St. Regis Butler service, available any time, day or night.

深圳禧程酒店是一家商务连锁酒店，坐落于风景秀丽的荔枝公园旁，空气清新，公园植物释放大量的负离子，使人真正享受到繁华都市的另一片天空；酒店毗邻地王大厦、深圳证券交易所、深圳书城及各大银行；超大落地玻璃窗，倚窗眺望，可欣赏到著名的深圳地标性建筑地王大厦及邓小平画像，整个环境幽雅、繁华，闹中取静，又尽享城市交通的便利；是客人商务、旅游、购物、休闲的理想下榻场所　　酒店设计豪华气派，客房配套设施齐备，均设有简约现代的洗浴间、冷暖空调、数字电视、宽带上网、国际、国内直拨电话、茶具、电热水壶、吹风筒等服务设施，让客人的旅途更添轻松。除了经过精心挑选的符合人体工学的床垫及舒适的床上有品，酒店还选用了独特的荞麦双面枕头，为客人营造最舒适的睡眠环境。　　酒店的周围工地已于2010年9月施工完毕,大型购物广场－－京基百纳空间于2010年10月正试开业，深圳最高楼－－-京基100也于2011年4月23日封顶。酒店外围已形成了一个繁华的高档的购物场所。 感谢大家一直以来的支持，酒店将不断加大管理力度，提高服务质量，让入住深圳禧程酒店的每一位客人都倍感“值”。

If you like delicious food of either Chinese or western, Chinese restaurant and western restaurant will satisfy you. The hotel has a coffee hall and a bar where are the nice places for killing time. Recreation center is a place where you may find the interesting from Gym, chess and cards, table tennis, etc

Hong Gui Business Hotel is a 4 star business hotel, which is located in the financial and commercial center of Shenzhen, compound with advanced office buildings. The hotel has 209 guest rooms of different types, such as standard rooms, superior rooms, deluxe rooms, business suites, etc. Living in the hotel, guests could enjoy wifi in public area, free internet access in rooms, and newspaper for free. There are big TV set, IDD, DDD, mini bar, sofa, private bathtub, shower and other facilities. In order to meet the business demands of the guest, the hotel supplies conference rooms with modern equipment. Western restaurant are in the first floor, and Chinese restaurant are in the second floor, both of them are available to make guests taste delicious food. In the recreation center of the hotel, guests could enjoy swimming pool, chess room, sauna, massage, etc.

Feng Shun Business Hotel is a hotel constructed as 4 star standard, located in the city center of Shenzhen, which is a warm home away from guests home. This hotel has totally 128 guest rooms, these are the biggest attractive objects, all the rooms are luxury, fashionable, and various style. Guests can enjoy free wifi in public area, free internet access in rooms. Besides, TV set, separate air conditioning system, in room safe, mini bar, bathroom, etc. considering business guests¡¯ demands, the hotel prepares small conference rooms carrying 20 and big one carrying 120 persons. Restaurants of the hotel supply mainly group food, and multi choice dinning room is few minutes away. Other service facilities are sauna, hairdressing, 42 chess room for playing, massage, and money change, car rental, laundry, etc are all available, satisfying your needs.
“粤海之星（GDH inn）”商务快捷连锁酒店是粤海（国际）酒店管理集团有限公司推出的商务快捷连锁系列品牌。“粤海之星”鲜明的建筑装饰风格，时尚、简约的特色，体贴入微的高品质服务，粤海标准的管理模式，绝佳的城市商务中心的地理位置，将使客户尽享便利、快捷。

LJ Commercial Hotel is a 4 star business hotel which is located in the Nashan district of Shenzhen. Furthermore, the hotel is located at golden area of Shenzhen south mountain-huaqiao town tour area. There are 128 rooms in the hotel. Customers can enjoy free WIFI in public area, and free wired internet and free wifi in rooms. All rooms have facilities with key card system, writing desk, cable satellite TV, mini bar, independency bathroom, etc. In addition, view of Hongshanshu Park will be enjoyed through overlooking out of window. The hotel provides a multifunction meeting room, which can contain 60 people.You can go to the restaurant which provides Cantonese dishes from 1 floor to 3 floors. The lobby bar will provide Western world's top coffee, which will allow you enjoying strong European amorous atmosphere. The hotel will welcome you with their warm service.

lines: INTERSECTION OF  BAOMIN 2 ROAD AND ZHUANGBIAN ROAD

description.text: Master Hotel Baoan Shenzhen is a 4 star business hotel located in the flourishing area of Shenzhen city. It closes to the Baoan Coach Station, and the world of windows, and the Happy valley. So you can enjoy your traveling very well. Shuttle service is provided. There are 112 rooms bright and spacious rooms including non smoking rooms, in which the inner ornaments and advanced facilities will enable the guests to have a pleasant relax. Besides all rooms provide free wired internet and free wifi also free wifi in public area, free newspapers for the guests. No matter taste delicious food or interview clients, it’s a smart choice for the you to go to Taiwan restaurant, the service makes you to satisfy. Guest in our hotel will be serviced with hairdressing, massage, chess, KTV, night club, gym, etc. Our hotel offers a convenience, high-efficient, warm service to guests, welcome.

Orient Fashion Hotel is a 4 star business hotel which is located in the thriving business area of Shenzhen. It has a good location and convenient traffic. Only 5 minutes ride to the business street and 15 minutes far away from shenzhen conference and exhibition center. It offers a serene place for rest with 140 rooms and suites which are well furnished with comfort and technology systems. Free wifi in public area, free wired and free wifi in rooms air-conditioner, refrigerator, hair drier, electric kettle, private bathroom with shower, mini bar, independent desk and chairs etc. There are spaces of meetings and banquet facilities can hold up to 120 persons. In its restaurant, you will find your favorite Chinese and Western foods include Hunan cuisine, Cantonese cuisine, Hakka cuisine and buffet. There is also a fitness center located near from the hotel. Excepting you!

Century Garden Hotel is a 4 star business hotel locates in the city center of Shenzhen. The hotel is located in the Futian District, next to the Shenzhen Gymnasium. It will take five minutes by car to Huaqiang North commercial district, a unique geographical location, convenient transportation and a beautiful environment. The hotel has 130 different types of rooms. Guests can enjoy free wifi in public area, free internet access in rooms, English newspaper and mineral water. Besides, DDD/IDD, air conditioner, satellite TV, mini bar and bathroom, etc. There are 2 meeting rooms which can contain 100 people at the same time. The hotel provides kinds of flavor restaurants which include Chinese food and western food restaurant, Bar and tea house. Entertainment facilities include sauna equipped with hairdressing, sauna, Japanese-style massage room, nightclubs, KTV, chess room, etc.

深圳君临新概念酒店位于深圳市福田区八卦路，紧靠北环大道、泥岗西路，毗邻人才大市场、深圳体育馆，距市政府、会展中心仅6公里，离华强北、东门商业圈、火车站10分钟车程，是深圳商业中心区。往宝安国际机场仅30分钟车程，地理位置优越，交通便利，环境优美，是一个“闹中取静”的优雅场所。    酒店一楼采用全透明的玻璃，大堂宽敞明亮，酒店拥有布置洁净、时尚的各类客房，更有宽带上网，自助商务区、自助洗衣房、风格餐厅，凸显商务快捷的服务理念。　　酒店开业时间2007年4月，2009年局部装修，楼高8层，客房总数108间（套）。

深圳圣廷苑酒店于2001年8月31日正式对外营业，以其优越的地理位置、超前的绿色商务观念和卓越的产品及服务品质，逐渐成为深圳酒店业的龙头和海内外顾客之首选。酒店开业至今，一直以其高度的社会责任感和超前的“绿色商务”经营理念，锐意进取，开拓创新，率先在国内酒店业创造性地导入“卓越绩效模式”，持续创新“舒适、健康、安全、环保”的绿色产品和优质服务，取得了卓越成效。作为深圳市唯一一家获得“深圳市市长品质奖”的星级酒店--深圳圣廷苑酒店,开业至今获得了一系列的荣誉，“中国酒店金枕头奖”、“全国十大会议酒店”以及“深圳最佳酒店Best BusinessHotel in Shenzhen”，并且成为深圳唯一连续三年获得该项殊荣的酒店。

hotel.name: Green Tree Inn Hua Qiang Bei

lines: NO.145, FUXING ROAD, FUTIAN DISTRICT, SHENZHEN

description.text: 店位于市中心黄金地段—福田区福华路与福星路交界，地处深圳华强北商圈内，靠近深圳本土著名的茂业百货、曼哈商城、赛格电子城、外贸服装批发城、女人世界等商业旺区；交通便捷，北靠深南大道，南接滨海大道，距地铁华强路站约500米，距深圳火车站、罗湖口岸10分钟车程，距离皇岗口岸、会展中心、华联大厦（330机场大巴）只需5分钟车程，酒店竭诚为客人提供舒适安静的客房，环保卫生的日用品，温馨洁净的卫浴，免费光纤高速宽带服务，免费拨打国内市内电话服务等；周边配套设施齐全，餐饮、娱乐应有尽有，是您商务、购物、休闲、娱乐的理想住所。

深圳雷圳宾馆是一家精品型经济酒店，特邀国际名师按欧陆式标准设计，风格高雅极致；座落于深圳福田区黄金地段。东倚华强北商业中心，南傍皇岗口岸，与深圳中心公园隔路相望，邻近深圳世界贸易广场，交通便利。　　宾馆拥有不同类型的豪华客房，房内皆配有宽带高速无限上网；倚立窗前，或鸟瞰 “福田世贸中心”，或俯揽静谧恬阔“红树海湾”，心旷神怡，嚣尘荡然无存。周边餐饮、休闲、旅游设施林立，配套设施完善。　　宾馆开业时间2011年5月1日，位于雷圳大厦3、7层，客房总数47间（套）。
振兴宾馆地处繁华商业街之侧，是住客逛街购物的好去处，交通便利。
酒店位于深圳市福田区繁华的福华路123号，位置优越，交通便利，由地铁华强站C出口步行至酒店只需10分钟，距会展中心只需10分钟车程，数分钟就可达到皇岗口岸，距宝安机场只需30分钟车程，酒店周围商铺林立，距华强北的茂业百货、曼哈购物广场、女人世界步行街15分钟可到达，无论是商务还是休闲购物都倍感方便。

深圳国丰酒店位于深圳市中心地带——福田区彩田路12号，地处彩田南路与福华路交汇处，地铁岗厦站D出口，毗邻深圳会展中心、皇岗口岸，不但地理位置优越，而且交通条件非常之便利，居住舒适，是闹市中的绿洲。酒店设有商务、豪华套房及标准单、双间等各类客房，并配有高级卫生洁具、中央空调、卫星电视系统、国际直拨电话等设施；酒店还有商务中心、棋牌室、茶艺轩，为客人提供更为方便及个性化的生活空间；　　同时酒店另设有大型园林式停车场，为下榻宾客创造宁静、舒适的环境，使客人繁忙的公务行程和悠闲假期变得更轻松愉快。　　酒店开业时间1999年3月5日，2003年5月局部装修，楼高13层，客房总数124间（套）。

深圳市365快捷酒店-会展中心店是深圳365酒店集团投资建立的第一家精品经济型酒店样板店。坐落于深圳市CBD商圈内，地理位置极为优越，位于福田区彩田路和滨河路交汇处，步行可至1号地铁岗厦站，交通便利。酒店拥有豪华双人房、大床房、标准双人房、标准单人房、特价房等不同的房型，房间设计遵从“少即是多”的原则，温馨、舒适，简洁、时尚于一体，充分体现了人性化的特点。　　酒店所有房间设施设备完善，均设有宽带上网、数字电视、二十四小时热水、国内长途直拨、独立保险箱、迷你商务中心等设施，周边餐饮、娱乐休闲场所齐备，是客人商务、休闲旅游的理想之所。　　酒店开业时间2007年1月8日，2010年1月局部装修，青年大厦8-10层，客房总数60间（套）。

Vienna Boutique Hotel (Fuhua Branch) is a 4 star business hotel which is located at city center of Shenzhen, 40 kilometers to airport, 5 kilometers to train station, 5 minutes to conference center, 10 minutes to shopping area, 15 minutes to world window. Hotel by the famous designers, sophisticated European style. There are 488 rooms in total. Internet, newspaper, mineral water are free for the guests. There are equipped with satellite TV, IDD and DDD telephone, free WIFI in public area, and free wired internet and free wifi in rooms, safe, drier, independent air conditioner, mini bar and an elegant bathroom. Chinese and Western restaurants will serve guests diverse food. description.text: U Hotel is a 4 star business hotel locates in the business district of Shenzhen city and is close to major commercial, entertainments and shopping areas such as Sea World and Wal-Mart Stores. description.text: 酒店位于深圳福田区景田东路与商报路的交汇处，地处深圳行政、文化、金融、旅游、商业的中心位置。酒店往深圳会展中心只需10分钟,  距深圳宝安国际机场仅35公里，到达火车站、罗湖口岸、皇岗口岸、福田口岸、深圳湾口岸也只需20分钟车程，前往华侨城著名主题公园（锦绣中华、民俗文化村、世界之窗、欢乐谷）约15分钟车程，交通十分便捷。

description.text: Vienna Hotel Yinhu is a 4 star business hotel located in Yinhu Lake Scenic Area of Shenzhen. description.text: Venus Hotel is a 4 star business and resort hotel locates in the center of Shenzhen. There are 26.5 kilometers to airport, 11.6 kilometers to convention center. It is a feature style in the hotel. There are 13 floors and 15000 square meters, 200 modernized rooms in the hotel. Guests can enjoy free wifi in public area, free wired and free wifi in rooms, besides there are DDD, IDD, TV, multi-type electrical outlet, drier, independent desk and chairs, comfortable bedding and small sofa, electric kettle, slippers, private bathroom with shower, 24 hour hot water supplying, etc. Laundry, wake-up and room service are available if guests need. There are two conference rooms with max 200 persons and full of equipment. If guests would like to taste delicious food, please go to Chinese or Western restaurant. In recreation center, you can enjoy massage, sauna, chess and card, SPA, etc. Welcome.

莫泰168（深圳龙华店）是莫泰连锁旅店在深圳地区开设的第一家直营酒店。酒店地处深圳宝安区龙华镇油松村东环一路与东环二路交叉处，东面是华为企业集团，北邻富士康集团，西近龙华商业中心，紧靠红磨坊酒吧街，交通十分便利。　　酒店拥有大床房、标准间，所有客房均配有宽带上网、IDD、有线电视、卫星电视及VOD点播系统等设施，并配有大型停车场。同时拥有140个餐位的美林阁餐厅，以上海海派菜为主，集西餐、酒吧、咖啡为一体，是商务洽谈、小型聚会、娱乐休闲的理想场所。　　酒店开业时间2006年10月22日，楼高7层，客房总数227间（套）。

深圳旅游学院燕晗山酒店位于环境优美的深圳华侨城旅游度假区。她依山而建，周围环境清净幽雅；驰名中外的“世界之窗”、“中国民俗文化村”、“锦绣中华”、“欢乐谷”四大景区近在咫尺。    酒店距机场、火车站、蛇口仅20分钟车程，各种巴士来往穿梭，交通极为便利。酒店集客房、餐饮、商务、会议、娱乐、健身于一体。客房设备齐全、温馨舒适；餐厅雅洁大方、名厨主理、南北风味、标准任选；酒店设有大、中、小型会议室，学院设有多功能报告厅、阶梯教室、大礼堂，可容纳1000人同时开会，实为各种会议之首选。   学院有设计独特的室内网球场、羽毛球场、棋牌室、乒乓球室等，可为您的旅程增添色彩。

description.text: 名典商旅酒店（深圳龙华店）位于深圳市宝安区龙华东环一路与民清路交汇处，邻近龙华商业中心，周边生活配套设施完善，去往地铁龙华站乘车约10分钟，距离深圳龙华汽车站乘车10分钟，距离深圳宝安国际机场乘车约35分钟，穗联商业广场和富士康集团步行即到，地理位置优越，交通出行便利。　　名典商旅酒店（深圳龙华店）配有各类客房，房间宽敞，舒适，简洁，清新，房间配备中央空调，32寸液晶电视，免费光纤上网服务，免费国内长途等基本设施，酒店一楼设有“中国驰名商标”名典咖啡语茶，为您提供各式精美的中西式套餐以及自助早餐服务。酒店设计新颖，风格清新简约，是您商务出差的理想之所。　　酒店开业时间2011年9月，主楼高10层，客房总数115间（套）。
